name: nfand
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: nfxfrd(s0, w0, wa(w1, w2), wn(wi(w1, wn(w2))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wa(w1, w2), wn(wi(w1, wn(w2))))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, wn(wi(w1, wn(w2)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wa(w1, w2), wn(wi(w1, wn(w2))))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, wn(wi(w1, wn(w2)))))

|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, wn(wi(w1, wn(w2)))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wn(wi(w1, wn(w2)))))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, wi(w1, wn(w2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, wi(w1, wn(w2))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wi(w1, wn(w2))))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, wn(w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, wn(w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wn(w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnf(s0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))

comment: If in a context ` x ` is not free in ` ps ` and ` ch ` , then it is not free in ` ( ps /\ ch ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.)
